venue.name: The Dirt Power Line Parking Lot Near

item.description:
The first picture shows the parking lot under the power line.  The second picture shows a closer view of what the sign on the telephone pole would look like.

 

Here is a link to a trail map.

http://conservation.milfordnh.info/pdf_docs/trail_maps/map_trail_Tucker2pgs.pdf

Please note that the power line parking lot is actually in between 201 and 221 Savage Road.  However, with Google maps, using the address of 321 Savage Road for Milford, NH put me exactly at the power line.  Go figure.


Tucker Brook Town Forest is 285 acres of mostly forested, rolling terrain, and provides excellent hikes in all seasons. I believe the route I plan to take will end up being approximately between 4.5 and 5.1 miles as they don't give a length on some of the trails.


On parts of the Falls Loop Trail, the Lower Path, and the Brook Trail the trail is either beside or very near Tucker Brook. There is also a rather small water fall on the Falls Loop which would be frozen this time of year.

Any one wanting a preview can check out the photo album from a previous time we were there, of course there might be a little more snow on the ground this time:

http://www.meetup.com/Manchester-Doggie-Paws/photos/4236522/

Any adult guest you want to bring should sign up on the meetup site as a member so they will be covered by the liability waiver. A minor would need a written waiver signed by a parent or guardian

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can causeproperty damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Turn onto Phelan Road from 101 in Milford and proceed 0.2 miles following the curve in the road to the left. Phelan Road becomes Savage Road. Proceed 0.8 miles and between 201 & 221 Savage Rd turn into the Power Line Parking lot on the left.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Tucker Brook Town Forest 4.5 - 5.1 Mile Hike (approximate)
